spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout in the 3D render does not match the 2D plan. Major zoning errors: the plan’s clear separation of Theatre (left-middle), Bed 2 (left-middle), Activity (upper-middle), and the Living/Kitchen core is not preserved. The 3D appears to convert multiple distinct rooms into larger open areas and relocates wet areas. Door locations and swing/orientation do not follow the plan, and exterior openings (alfresco/verandah/portico connections) are not represented correctly. Room proportions are noticeably altered (e.g., Living/Kitchen/Theatre regions).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships from the plan are frequently broken (e.g., Theatre next to Bed2/Living; Activity adjacent to Beds 3&4; Laundry/Bath/WC cluster). Multiple labeled plan spaces are missing or merged. The model introduces elements not present in the plan (a central stepped/railed feature resembling a stair/sunken area). Wall thickness looks generally consistent, but interior partitions do not match the plan’s wall alignment and segmentation.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not map to the correct rooms per the 2D plan (e.g., Theatre seating arrangement vs. open-plan lounge/dining; bedroom count and placements inconsistent). Several spaces that should contain specific built-ins (robes/WIR/pantry/laundry bench) are not represented accurately. Scale is plausible visually, but the furniture placement corresponds to a different layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean and readable with coherent lighting and materials. Camera is broadly isometric-like but not a strict architectural axonometric/orthographic match. Geometry quality is generally good with minimal artifacts; however, clarity is reduced by structural mismatches (spaces read as a different design than the provided plan).

detected_errors.description: Missing Alfresco area (plan shows a large ALFRESCO at upper-right with exterior boundary; 3D does not clearly depict this outdoor room or its correct boundary).
Missing Verandah and Portico (plan front/bottom outdoor elements are not represented as separate exterior spaces in the 3D).
Missing distinct Theatre room (plan has a dedicated THEATRE at left-middle; 3D shows an open living/dining-type area instead).
Missing/unclear Laundry + Bath + WC cluster at upper-left/left-middle (plan shows a specific arrangement; 3D wet areas do not match or are merged/relocated).
Missing/unclear Activity room (plan has ACTIVITY centrally at top; 3D does not show a dedicated room with matching placement).
Missing/unclear multiple bedroom set (plan includes BED 2, BED 3, BED 4, and MASTER SUITE; 3D shows fewer bedrooms and does not preserve their positions).
Kitchen/Pantry placement and surrounding walls do not match plan (plan places KITCHEN centrally with PANTRY above it; 3D kitchen appears shifted and not enclosed/partitioned as in plan).
Entry/Study region mismatched (plan has ENTRY and STUDY at bottom-center; 3D does not preserve the same compartmentalized front layout).
Incorrect door placement and/or orientation across multiple internal connections (e.g., bedroom/bath/WIR entries and major room transitions do not match the plan’s door locations and swings).
Window placement does not follow the plan’s exterior openings (plan shows specific window runs along top bedrooms and living/alfresco edges; 3D window distribution appears generic and not aligned).
Room proportion distortions: major rooms are resized/reshaped (Living/Kitchen/Theatre zones read significantly different from plan dimensions and boundaries).
Hallucinated central stepped/railed feature (resembles stairs/sunken area) not present in the single-level 2D plan.
Hallucinated/incorrect internal partitions creating spaces not shown in plan (e.g., extra corridor-like segmentation and rearranged wet-area partitions).
